data.quote: if you were born with the weakness to fall you were born with the strength to rise.
data.author: Rupi Kaur

data.quote: the world gives you so much pain and here you are making gold out of it - there is nothing purer than that
data.author: Rupi Kaur

data.quote: it was when I stopped searching for home within others and lifted the foundations of home within myself I found there were no roots more intimate than those between a mind and body that have decided to be whole.
data.author: Rupi Kaur

data.quote: it takes grace to remain kind in cruel situations
data.author: Rupi Kaur

data.quote: You do not just wake up and become the butterfly - Growth is a process.
data.author: Rupi Kaur

data.quote: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: Those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: Ships are safe in harbor, but that’s not what ships were built for.
data.author: John Shedd

data.quote: You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there's still going to be somebody who hates peaches.
data.author: Dita von Teese

data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: The reason we struggle with insecurity is because we compare our behind-the-scenes with everyone else’s highlight reel.
data.author: Steve Furtick

data.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known
data.author: Carl Sagan

data.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
data.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

data.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
data.author: Robert Frost.

data.quote: A man who has never made a mistake, has never tried anything new.
data.author: Albert Einstein.

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: Some people live more in 20 years than others do in 80. It’s not the time that matters, it’s the person.
data.author: Doctor Who

data.quote: In 900 years of time and space, I’ve never met anyone who wasn’t important.
data.author: Doctor Who

data.quote: Some women fear the fire. Some simply become it.
data.author: R. H. Sin

data.quote: But you've always been good enough. You've just been giving the best parts of you to the wrong people.
data.author: R. H. Sin
